title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) File List in the File menu is not persisted between sessions.
OB: When opening files in the application, they appear in the File menu MRU list. However, when closing and reopening the application, the files no longer appear in the MRU list.
EB: The files that have been opened in the application should be persisted between sessions and continue to appear in the File menu MRU list.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Open several files.
3. Observe that the files appear in the File menu MRU list.
4. Close the application and reopen it.
5. Observe that the files no longer appear in the File menu MRU list.
